results.title: Can metformin modulate the retinal degenerative changes in a rat model of retinitis pigmentosa?
results.text_hl: @<m>CHEMICAL_Metformin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D008687 @@@Metformin@@@ is demonstrated as a potential therapeutic approach for preventing light-induced @<m>DISEASE_Retinal_Degeneration</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D012162 @@@retinal degeneration@@@ by decreasing apoptosis and oxidative stress.

results.title: AMPK May Play an Important Role in the Retinal Metabolic Ecosystem.
results.text_hl: We investigated whether activation of 5' adenosine monophosphate protein kinase (AMPK) is protective to the retina in several preclinical @SPECIES_10090 @@@mouse@@@ models of @<m>DISEASE_Retinal_Degeneration</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D012162 @@@retinal degeneration@@@ and found that @<m>CHEMICAL_Metformin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D008687 @@@metformin@@@-induced activation of AMPK was able to delay or prevent @<m>DISEASE_Retinal_Degeneration</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D012162 @@@retinal degeneration@@@ in the @CELLLINE_CVCL:0028 @@@rd10@@@ model of @DISEASE_Retinitis_Pigmentosa @DISEASE_MESH:D012174 @@@retinitis pigmentosa@@@, the @CHEMICAL_sodium_iodate @CHEMICAL_MESH:C032285 @@@NaIO3@@@ model of @CELLLINE_CVCL:4388 @@@RPE@@@ and @DISEASE_Retinitis @DISEASE_MESH:D012173 @@@retinal injury@@@, and the @DISEASE_Photophobia @DISEASE_MESH:D020795 @@@light damage@@@ model of @<m>DISEASE_Retinal_Degeneration</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D012162 @@@retinal degeneration@@@.

citations.NLM: Brown EE, Lewin AS, Ash JD. AMPK May Play an Important Role in the Retinal Metabolic Ecosystem. Adv Exp Med Biol. 2019;1185():477-481. PMID: 31884657
citations.BibTeX: @article{31884657, title={AMPK May Play an Important Role in the Retinal Metabolic Ecosystem.}, author={Brown EE and Lewin AS and Ash JD}, journal={Adv Exp Med Biol}, volume={1185}, pages={477-481}}

results.title: Stimulation of AMPK prevents degeneration of photoreceptors and the retinal pigment epithelium.
results.journal: Proc Natl Acad Sci U S A
results.text_hl: To determine whether protection was a local or a systemic effect of @<m>CHEMICAL_Metformin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D008687 @@@metformin@@@, we used AMPK retinal knockout @SPECIES_10090 @@@mice@@@ and found that local expression of AMPK catalytic subunit alpha2 was required for @<m>CHEMICAL_Metformin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D008687 @@@metformin@@@-induced protection.

citations.NLM: Xu L, Kong L, Wang J, Ash JD. Stimulation of AMPK prevents degeneration of photoreceptors and the retinal pigment epithelium. Proc Natl Acad Sci U S A. 2018 Oct 9;115(41):10475-10480. PMID: 30249643
